728766f-a.title: Richmond: Clove Road - Fingerboard Road
728766f-a.text:
Clove Road, south from near Fingerboard Road (vantage-point),
showing part of the valley near Cameron Lake which, according to
P. L. Sperr, is the site of the Cameron Park real estate development.
May 20, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728766f-a.folder: Clove Road & Fingerboard Road, Staten Island, NY

728769f-a.title: Richmond: Clove Road - Fingerboard Road
728769f-a.text:
(1)
Clove Road, east side, at its north intersection with
Fingerboard Road.
March 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, another view.
March 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728769f-a.folder: Clove Road & Fingerboard Road, Staten Island, NY

728768f-b.text:

Clove Road, south from near Vingerboard Road, showing, what
P. L. Sperr refers to, as the Cameron Park real estate development.
May 20, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A view of the real estate development site near Cameron Lake,
as seen from the road.
May 20, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
A view of the area in a different direction.
May 20, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.

728767f-c.title: Richmond: Clove Road - Fingerboard Road
728767f-c.text:
Clove Road, south of Fingerboard Road (vantage point), showing
a view of the valley near Cameron Lake. P. L. Sperr states that it is
the site of the Cameron Lake real estate development. This is a set of
three views taken the same day.
May 20, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728767f-c.folder: Clove Road & Fingerboard Road, Staten Island, NY
